import React from 'react' import imgSun from "../assets/sun.svg" import imgWater from "../assets/water.svg" export default function Cards({cartItems,total,deletCart}) { var tbwater=[] const water=(par)=>{ tbwater=[] for(let i=0;i) } return tbwater } return (
total pannier: {cartItems.length}
    {cartItems.map(item=>( <>
  • {item.name} {item.quantity} deletCart(item)}>X
    • ))}
TOTAL: {total} $
) }
